column4: does anyone have any idea about my CD-rom problem?  I can't read CDs for some reason, though I can write them and I can read and write DVDs just fine.  CDs don't seem to be able to mount
how are you mounting them? And is it a music CD or data CD?
both don't work... mount /dev/hdb /media/cdrom0 says "no medium found"
If it's a music CD, you can't mount it
do you get an error from mount?
looks like your CD-ROM drive can't read the CD
why might that be?  ALL my CDs are like this... and all my DVDs are fine
and the drive works fine when I'm in Windows, and burns ISOs just fine
or at least it used to be able to burn ISOs, I haven't tried it recently
ls -l /dev/cdrw gives lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 3 2006-12-10 16:50 /dev/cdrw -> hdb
sudo mount -t iso9660 /dev/cdrw /media/cdrom0 gives "mount: no medium found"
